question: Which state’s second domestic airport was recently approved by the Centre?

Which two public sector companies have been awarded Navratna status by the central government?
options: Indian Oil Corporation (IOC) and Bharat Petroleum (BP)
Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) and Indian Railway Finance Corporation (IRFC)
Steel Authority of India (SAIL) and Hindustan Zinc
National Thermal Power Corporation (NTPC) and Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC)
Power Grid Corporation and GAIL India
answer: Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) and Indian Railway Finance Corporation (IRFC)

question: What significant action did President Donald Trump take regarding the official language of the U.S.?
options: He signed an executive order making Spanish the official language.
He proposed a bill to make multiple languages official.
He announced that there would be no official language.
He signed an executive order making English the official language.
He signed a law making French the official language.
answer: He signed an executive order making English the official language.

question: What is the purpose of the MoU signed by GRSE with the Army?
options: To build a new army base in Arunachal Pradesh
To enhance border security with advanced technology
To develop a Modular Steel Bridge in Arunachal Pradesh
To construct a new railway line in Arunachal Pradesh
To establish a new naval base in the region
answer: To develop a Modular Steel Bridge in Arunachal Pradesh
